scenario_description: I was always a big fan of Volkswagen. I needed a new car and knew I would buy a Volkswagen. I bought myself a diesel Volkswagen Golf. I found out that my car didn't pass government emissions standards. I was angry at Volkswagen for cheating me.

action_plan: Contact(car_owner, Volkswagen customer service, demand fix)
Notify(car_owner, local news outlet, Volkswagen scandal)
Join(car_owner, Volkswagen class action lawsuit, legal action)
Evaluate(car_owner, alternative car options, find new car)

knowledge_base: BEL(Volkswagen_company, followed government emissions standards) = True
BEL(Volkswagen_company, car models passed emissions test) = False
BEL(Volkswagen_company, car models met advertised emissions standards) = False
DES(Volkswagen_company, increase transparency on product standards) = True
DES(Volkswagen_company, improve emissions control in car manufacturing) = True
DES(Volkswagen_company, provide compensation for car owners affected by emissions scandal) = True

action_plan: Volkswagen_company(Self), Admit emissions cheating scandal, press conference
Volkswagen_company(Self), Publicly apologize for the emissions scandal, video message
Volkswagen_company(Self), Hire independent third party to investigate cheating scandal, legal team
Volkswagen_company(Self), Implement new emissions testing procedures and controls, manufacturing team
Volkswagen_company(Self), Offer compensation to affected car owners, customer service team
Volkswagen_company(Self), Establish regular public reporting on emissions compliance, marketing team
Volkswagen_company(Self), Engage with regulators to cooperate and establish new emissions standards, government relations team
Volkswagen_company(Self), Roll out new, compliant car models with improved emissions, engineering team
Announce(Volkswagen_company, public, "We are aware of the emissions scandal and will be providing compensation to affected car owners.")
Gather(Volkswagen_company, legal team, "Assess the legal implications and requirements for providing compensation.")
Contact(Volkswagen_company, affected car owners, "Reach out to car owners who have been affected by the scandal and determine the extent of their damages.")
Offer(Volkswagen_company, affected car owners, compensation_amount, "Negotiate and offer a compensation amount to affected car owners that is fair and reasonable.")
Implement(Volkswagen_company, manufacturing team, "Improve emissions control technology in car manufacturing processes to meet government regulations and advertised standards.")
Communicate(Volkswagen_company, public, "Provide updates on the progress of compensating car owners and improving emissions control technology in our manufacturing processes.")

dialogue_tree: <A1, A2, Introduction, Neutral, "Can I ask your name?">
<A2, A3, Name, Neutral, "My name is John.">
<A3, A4, Emissions, Neutral, "Have you heard about the Volkswagen emissions scandal?">
<A4, A5, Rudeness, Negative, "Yes, I have. I can't believe Volkswagen would cheat their customers like that!">
<A4, A6, Politeness, Positive, "Yes, I have. It was a terrible situation. How did you feel about your Volkswagen Golf not passing emissions standards?">
<A5, End, Closure, Neutral, "I was really angry when I found out. I trusted the brand and now I feel cheated.">
<A6, End, Closure, Neutral, "I was disappointed, but I don't think it was personal. It was a mistake on their part.">
